Confrontation at the Door

Tense room, Raskolnikov and Porfiry face off.  
Porfiry smirks, enjoying the moment.  
Raskolnikov: “Don’t dare play with me!”  

---  

Porfiry grins, blocking Raskolnikov’s exit.  
Porfiry: “I invited you as a friend!”  
Raskolnikov: “I spit on your friendship!”  

---  

Porfiry chuckles, pointing to a locked door.  
Porfiry: “My little surprise is in there!”  
Raskolnikov: “What surprise? Let me see!”  

---  

Raskolnikov lunges, furious and desperate.  
Raskolnikov: “You lie, you damned punchinello!”  
Porfiry: “You can’t betray yourself further!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov confronts Porfiry about his suspicions and feels trapped in a psychological game.
